Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.5.2/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "
setwd\(''tests/testthat''\)
source\(''../../postSim.R''\)
source\(''../../post.R''\)
# Now run tests with source\(\) calls expected to find files in cwd â€” 
# we''ll just inline-run the test logic instead
library\(testthat\)

# Test 1: holds preserves non-numeric types for glm models
test_that\(''holds preserves non-numeric types for glm models'', {
  d <- mtcars
  d$am_f <- factor\(ifelse\(d$am == 1, ''manual'', ''auto''\)\)
  fit <- glm\(vs ~ am_f + wt, data = d, family = binomial\(\)\)
  set.seed\(1\)
  res <- post\(fit, holds = list\(am_f = ''manual''\), n.sims = 50, digits = 6\)
  expect_s4_class\(res, ''post''\)
  expect_false\(any\(is.na\(res@est\)\)\)
}\)

# Test 2: post rejects silently recycled glm weights
test_that\(''post rejects silently recycled glm weights'', {
  fit <- glm\(vs ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars, family = binomial\(\)\)
  expect_error\(
    post\(fit, weights = rep\(1, 2\), n.sims = 20\),
    ''weights must have the same length as the estimation sample''
  \)
}\)

# Test 3: post rejects silently recycled polr weights
test_that\(''post rejects silently recycled polr weights'', {
  skip_if_not_installed\(''MASS''\)
  d <- transform\(mtcars, gear_f = ordered\(gear\)\)
  fit <- MASS::polr\(gear_f ~ wt + hp, data = d, method = ''logistic''\)
  expect_error\(
    post\(fit, weights = rep\(1, 3\), n.sims = 20\),
    ''weights must have the same length as the estimation sample''
  \)
}\)
")

Bash("C:\\Program Files\\R\\R-4.5.2\\bin\\Rscript.exe" -e "
library\(clarify\)
# Test sim_apply with custom function
fit <- glm\(vs ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars, family = binomial\(\)\)
set.seed\(123\)
s <- sim\(fit, n = 50\)

# Custom function that replicates observed-value approach
a <- sim_apply\(s, FUN = function\(fit\) {
  d <- fit[[''model'']]
  d[[''wt'']] <- 2
  p <- predict\(fit, newdata = d, type = ''response''\)
  c\(''E[Y\(wt=2\)]'' = mean\(p\)\)
}, verbose = FALSE\)
print\(summary\(a\)\)
")

Bash("C:\\Program Files\\R\\R-4.5.2\\bin\\Rscript.exe" -e "
fit <- lm\(mpg ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars\)
summ <- summary\(fit\)
cat\(''sigma:'', summ[[''sigma'']], ''\\n''\)
cat\(''cov.unscaled:\\n''\)
print\(summ[[''cov.unscaled'']]\)
cat\(''\\nvcov:\\n''\)
print\(vcov\(fit\)\)
cat\(''\\nRatio \(vcov / cov.unscaled\):\\n''\)
print\(vcov\(fit\) / summ[[''cov.unscaled'']]\)
cat\(''\\nsigma^2:'', summ[[''sigma'']]^2, ''\\n''\)
")

Bash("/c/Program Files/R/R-4.5.2/bin/Rscript.exe" -e "
source\(''C:/Users/cdj19/repos/post/postSim.R''\)
source\(''C:/Users/cdj19/repos/post/post.R''\)
fit <- lm\(mpg ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars\)
# Test delta no-x
r1 <- post\(fit, method=''delta'', digits=4\)
cat\(''no-x delta:\\n''\); print\(r1@est\)
# Test delta x1
r2 <- post\(fit, x1name=''wt'', x1vals=c\(2,4\), method=''delta'', digits=4\)
cat\(''x1 delta:\\n''\); print\(r2@est\)
# Test delta x1+x2
r3 <- post\(fit, x1name=''wt'', x1vals=c\(2,4\), x2name=''hp'', x2vals=c\(100,200\), method=''delta'', digits=4\)
cat\(''x1+x2 delta est:\\n''\); print\(r3@est\)
cat\(''x1+x2 delta did:\\n''\); print\(r3@did\)
# Compare with simulation
set.seed\(1\)
s1 <- post\(fit, method=''simulation'', n.sims=50000, digits=4\)
cat\(''no-x sim:\\n''\); print\(s1@est\)
set.seed\(1\)
s2 <- post\(fit, x1name=''wt'', x1vals=c\(2,4\), method=''simulation'', n.sims=50000, digits=4\)
cat\(''x1 sim:\\n''\); print\(s2@est\)
")
